subject: Attn : Diane
body:
From the Office of the Chairman,
Ecowas bank plc .
Abuja Nigeria .

Sir ,

Re-  Approved  payment of $20M in Favor  of   Attn :  Diane
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Attn :  Diane

sir,

I acknowledged the receipt of your email with the contents well noted .
Reference to your question , this fund was forwarded to the bank from the
international Monetary fund as one of the beneficiaries who are going to
receive their funds through the Ecowas bank plc .

Based on your question, a total of $20M has been approved in your favor and
you are definitely going to receive it if you can adhere to advice from
this bank  .

To that effect , you are going to receive your fund from the Ecowas bank
plc Nigeria .

Yours sincerely

Dr . Abubakar Omar ,
Chairman , Ecowas bank plc.

subject: Re: Attn : Diane
body:
Hello, thank you for sharing this information with me. Could you please provide more details on how the fund will be transferred to Attn Diane?

Best wishes,
Diane

subject: Attn : Diane
body:
From the Office of the Chairman,
Ecowas bank plc .
Abuja Nigeria .

Sir ,

Re-  Approved  payment of $20M in Favor  of   Attn :  Diane
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Attn :  Diane

sir,

I acknowledged the receipt of your email with all the contents well noted .
Reference to your email, I must tell you  that your name is among the names
of beneficiaries who are going to receive their funds through this bank .

Based on that , the list was made available from the International
monitoring fund (IMF) to this bank and to make sure your fund is finally
available to you in any means of your choice .

For that reason , be rest assured of your fund since the order to transfer
your fund to your account is from the highly respected International
Monitoring fund.

Yours sincerely

Dr . Abubakar Omar ,
Chairman , Ecowas bank plc.

subject: Re: Attn : Diane
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate the update on the approved payment in favor of Attn Diane. Can you provide more details on how the transfer process works and what steps need to be taken next to ensure the funds are successfully transferred to the account?

Best wishes,
Diane

subject: Attn : Diane
body:
From the Office of the Chairman,
Ecowas bank plc .
Abuja Nigeria .

Sir ,

Re-  Approved  payment of $20M in Favor  of   Attn :  Diane
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Attn :  Diane

sir,

I acknowledged the receipt of your email with all the contents well noted .
Reference to your email,  The next step to follow now is for you to
reconfirm to this bank your full banking details, the address of your bank
, the name of your next of kin , your occupation and your direct telephone
number .

All these requirements will be used to carefully process your payment file
and to avoid transferring your fund into a wrong account .

Meanwhile , you still have the right by law to advise in any means you want
your fund to reach you .

Yours sincerely

Dr . Abubakar Omar ,
Chairman , Ecowas bank plc.

subject: Re: Attn : Diane
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to me from the Office of the Chairman at Ecowas Bank Plc in Abuja, Nigeria. I appreciate your message regarding the approved payment in favor of Attn Diane.

I understand the importance of confirming banking details to ensure a smooth processing of payments. Could you please provide more information on how the funds will be transferred and any additional steps I need to take on my end?

Looking forward to your guidance on this matter.

Best wishes,
Diane
